And therefore, when it comes to the role and contribution of Raja Ram Mohan Roy in modern education, one has to give him credit for ardently or completely supporting the modern liberal education in contrast with many orientalists within court who believes in the knowledge and wisdom which is contained in oriental and Indian tradition.
